mapper.select: SELECT board_no, title, writer, content, view_cnt, reg_date FROM ( SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(board pk_board)*/ rownum rn, board_no, title, writer, content, view_cnt, reg_date FROM board WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_no, writer, title, content) VALUES (seq_board.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
